document_data.caption: A map showing Zhentil Keep's Harbor District outlined in red.
document_data.name: Harbor District
document_data.mainbody: The '''Harbor District''' was a ward located within the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Harbor District sat in south-central Zhentil Keep along the [[River Tesh]] where it met the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]].
document_data.Description: The Harbor District was accessible from the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] by way of the [[Tesh Bridge]] in the west and the [[Force Bridge]] in the east. Access to the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] was available through an unnamed gate where [[Canter Street]] gave way to [[Ship Street (Zhentil Keep)|Ship Street]] to the west, and another gate in the east where [[Tesh Street]] met [[Barge Street]]. Direct access to the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] was not possible from the Harbor District.
document_data.Activities: The actual harbor here could easily dock up to 250 vessels. Use of the harbor for loading and unloading of cargo was allowed only for the [[Zhentarim]], lords of the city, and others with close relations to the Black Network.
document_data.Defenses: [[Zhentilar]] guardposts, barracks, and armories were situated throughout the entire quarter.
document_data.Notable Locations: Many large Zhentarim warehouses were located in the Harbor District. [[The Shield Faces North]] was a popular tavern within the district. Other locations of note included [[Oparil's Tower]] and [[Tern's Shipwright Service]].
